title: december 15: closing chernobyl
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the closing of the Chernobyl nuclear plant that exploded in 1984. Turning to music, she talks about a crazy accident at a Backstreet Boys concert. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
